特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
All classes are expected to be conducted on campus, face-to-face style. Google Classroom will be used for some course information and assignment submissions, and, also for any outside-of-class contact with the teacher. Therefore, students will NEED access to a computer at home or use a school computer lab to be able to properly complete and submit assignments. Desktop, laptop, notebook, Macbook, etc, are fine. Students should also have a Google account and sign up for Google Drive and Google Classroom (both are free).
This course is centered mainly on communication-based on the textbook information. This class requires interactive English-only communication with classmates every lesson.
< For students permitted to take classes online > - On-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes via Google Classroom.
------
This is an all-English classroom. Students can expect to communicate with the teacher and other students in English only. Assignments may require the use of a computer and online sites.

Additionally, this class is taught communicatively and the class functions as a community in which all members support each other. This means that students can expect to interact regularly through pair work or small groups to review course content and/or will have consistent interaction with the teacher.

第1回: Week 1 - Introductions: Course Explanation, Classroom Language, Technology Set-ups
第2回: Week 2 - Topic 1: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 1 (Essay)
第3回: Week 3 - Topic 1: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 1 (Essay)
第4回: Week 4 - Topic 2: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 1 (Essay)
第5回: Week 5 - Topic 2: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 1 (Essay)
第6回: Week 6 - Topic 3: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 2 (Presentation)
第7回: Week 7 - Topic 3: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 2 (Presentation)
第8回: Week 8 - Topic 4: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 2 (Presentation)
第9回: Week 9 - Topic 4: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 2 (Presentation)
第10回: Week 10 - Topic 5: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 3 (Student-led project)
第11回: Week 11 - Topic 5: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 3 (Student-led project)
第12回: Week 12 - Topic 6: Vocabulary Practice, Listening and Reading Practice; Project 3 (Student-led project)
第13回: Week 13 - Topic 6: Research, Conversation & Discussion Activities; Mini presentations; Project 3 (Student-led project)
第14回: Week 14 - Final Week:  Review; Reflection and Discussion

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 20% Essay; 20% Presentation; 20% Final Project; 40% in-class quizzes; discussions & student engagement
